Tool Status

The tool status page contains :

  • Tool Image
  • Tool Name
  • Tool Status
    • Production
    • Installation
    • Maintenance
    • Idle
  • Tool Statistics
    Statistics button is clicked , the page containing the pie chart with data in percentage is displayed.It also contains the utilization timeline of projects and user for the particular tool.

The page also contains the trend chart of that particular tool. The trend chart display information of the tool status for that particular month.
